description: A very light and refreshing salad with a hint of sourness.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Fennel, Guacamole, & Grapefruit Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 140g mixed salad leaves, washed and drained
2 medium avocado, peeled, de-seeded and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the fruit and veg by peeling, washing and cutting into bite size portions.
Mix all ingredients lightly in a bowl before serving with the fennel top as garnish.
